name: prosthodontist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a dentist who specializes in replacing missing, damaged, or unattractive teeth: She is a prosthodontist who teaches about dentures at the University of Louisville. Subsequently there were many visits to periodontists, orthodontists, prosthodontists, and plastic surgeons.
More examplesFewer examplesMy fancy prosthodontist quotes £5,000 per tooth for the package.I had always thought that I looked after and cleaned my teeth well, until I met my prosthodontist.Treatment plans are discussed with otolaryngologists, medical oncologists, pathologists, radiologists, and prosthodontists.
